titleInfo.title: Brought to the Second Municipality Police Prison.

mods.abstract: BROUGHT to the Second Municipality Police Prison--GEORGE, a dark griff, 5 feet 10 inches high, aged about 22 years, has a scar on the right side of his nose, and a large scar on his forehead over the left eye; says he belongs to Mr. Felix Carey, of St. Louis, Mo. HENRY, a mulatto, 5 feet 9 inches high, aged about 25 years, has a scar over the right eye; says he belongs to Mr. McBride, 40 miles from Alexandria. (His agent in New Orleans is Mr. Ellis.) MARY, a light griffe, 3 feet 3 inches high, aged about 9 years; says she belongs to a lady in the First Municipality. The owners will please conform with the law in regard to them. H.J. WILLIAMS, Warden. New Orleans, February 12, 1851. fe13 1aw3w

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
